short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Teach sciences online or collaborate effortlessly with colleagues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✔️ iDroo is an online educational multi-user whiteboard.

✔️ iDroo is a web app – no need to install, works in any web browser.

✔️ You can draw together with your friends, students, and colleagues on the same board in real-time.

✔️ Type simple and complex math equations.

✔️ Draw and write your ideas.

✔️ Call other participants.

✔️ Express your thoughts through images.

✔️ All drawings are easily editable vector graphics.

✔️ Import and mark up your documents.

✔️ Access your boards from anywhere.

✔️ Sharing is easy—just create a public board and send the URL to your friends.

Who uses iDroo?

✔️ Schools, universities, and private teachers for effective online tutoring.

✔️ Businesses for productive brainstorming.

✔️ Private users for interactive discussions.
